section.name: Development Tooling Tutorial
section.p: The development tooling tutorial walkes through the process of setting up a couple of projects using a central project library, building projects, adding testcases, creation modules, using alias references, and executing versioned builds.

tr.td: A walk through of setting up an index, creating a couple of projects, adding some content, executing a build, followed by a review of the process and the generated project resources.
Addition of a testcase to our 'system' project and demonstration of the automatic compilation and test execution provided by Depot.
A simple example of build customization using an explicit build.xml file. The example demonstrates the customaization of a build process using an overriding build file.
This tutorial takes us through the process of module creation and and includes an summary of the generated module and it's potential application when publishing content to external users.
Demonstrates the process of creating a collection of versioned artifacts and supporting module suitable for publication.
